Description: Bowl of marl pottery with a flat base and incurving irregular rim. The exterior surface is smoothed around the rim but rough scraped below. The interior has been carefully smoothed.
Curator's comments: For this site, see W. M. F. Petrie, 'Diospolis Parva : the cemeteries of Abadiyeh and Hu, 1898-9' (London, 1901). Marked H on base. Like Late ware L16B in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
